Package Model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The game is the object that is rented in the system.
    Version:
    0.4 19/5/22
    Author:
    Chris, Martin, Levente, Kruno
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      An 11 argument constructor used to copy the information from the database.
      Game​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String producer, java.lang.String console, java.lang.String esrb)
      A 4 argument constructor used to create a game from the information given in the add game view.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game​(int id,
            java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String producer,
            java.lang.String console,
            boolean rented,
            int daysLeft,
            int reviewCount,
            int reviewSum,
            float reviewAverage,
            java.lang.String esrb,
            java.time.LocalDate dateAdded)
        An 11 argument constructor used to copy the information from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the game
        name - name of the game
        producer - producer of the game
        console - the console the game is played on
        rented - if the game is rented or not
        daysLeft - days left until the game has to be returned
        reviewCount - the number of reviews for the game
        reviewSum - the total sum of all the reviews for the game
        reviewAverage - the average of all the reviews for the game
        esrb - the rating of the game
        dateAdded - date the game is added

      • Game

        public Game​(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String producer,
            java.lang.String console,
            java.lang.String esrb)
        A 4 argument constructor used to create a game from the information given in the add game view.
        Parameters:
        name - name of game
        producer - producer of the game
        console - platform on which the game can be played
        esrb - rating of the game

      • decrementDaysLeft

        public void decrementDaysLeft()
        Decreases the days left in the rental period. If the game is not rented, an exception is thrown. If the game ran out of days also sets rented to false

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Prints out a string of the game
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        name of game and whether the game is rented or not and the days left before the game has to be returned

      • rentGame

        public void rentGame()
        rents a game by setting rented to true and daysLeft to 14

      • returnGame

        public void returnGame()
        returns a game by setting rented to false and days left to 0.
